content: this is an easy and versatile top down jumper that requires no seaming and has very few ends to sew in depending on how many colours you are using it is made to fit as you go it can be made in any weight yarn in a single colour in stripes or even using all the odds and ends of your left over yarn of the same yarn weight you can also use any stitch or hook depending on the effect you are after i have written the pattern using uk trebles but feel free to get creative
